title: Matchmaking frustrations in blind
body:
I am a Bronze player, I deserve to be in Bronze because I play about once every few days for a game or two, and I'm not great.

So when I come into a Blind Pick match against an organised 3 queue, followed by an organised 5 man team, at least one of who is gold, this makes me hate the game. 

I want to play against people I can have an even match with for fun. I don't want to get stomped by people who are better than me, in blind queue, that's messed up.

You don't get randomly matched against NBA players when you're in a local Thursday night basketball comp, so why does LoL match me against people who are that much higher, and also organised when I'm solo? 

Frankly, it makes it un-enjoyable and I'm starting to feel my time is better spent elsewhere.

replies.body: Ranked and normal mmr is completely different.
